meanings: (줄) string, twine, cord, strap, (신발끈) shoelace, lace

vlive.korean: 그 끈이, 끈 있는 데가 앞인 건가? The string... That has it is the front?? 듣기 View video NCT : Jisung day💚💚
vlive.english: The string... That has it is the front??

vlive.korean: 끈도 좀 만들어 볼까요? Shall I make a string as well? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "미나’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: Shall I make a string as well?

vlive.korean: 불 끈 다음에 빠르게 저어야 돼요? Turn the flame off and stir quickly? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 스윗한 태현이의 스윗한거 만들기
vlive.english: Turn the flame off and stir quickly?

vlive.korean: 끈이 바깥으로 가야 돼요? 아 그래요? String needs to go outside? Really?? 듣기 View video NCT : Jisung day💚💚
vlive.english: String needs to go outside? Really??

vlive.korean: 민기야! - 끈 괜찮지? - 민기야 너 잠깐 쉴래? REN! - Are you okay with strings? - Will you take a break? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: REN! - Are you okay with strings? - Will you take a break?

examples.korean: a daring strapless dress in black silk 듣기 Add to Wordbook 검은 실크 소재의, 어깨 끈이 없는 대담한 드레스 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a daring strapless dress in black silk Add to Wordbook

examples.english: Don’t cut the string, untie the knots. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He loosed the straps that bound her arms. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그녀의 팔을 묶고 있던 끈을 풀어 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He loosed the straps that bound her arms. Add to Wordbook
